From the Java file: DistCheckoutReviewController.java

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5924] HU - FE issues detailpage
item.description:
Issue
Please have a look a the screenshot.

  1. Overlapping text (HU, ...): Is it possible to have a line-break there?
  2. The button is not placed correctly. Please fix.
  3. Cookie-button too small for text(HU, ...): Button should be enlarged, probably the whole overlay a bit.

Please check if the issues are present as well on RO, CZ, SK. If so please note in the ticket and fix too.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: The "Add to Cart" button moves down because the text inside the button is too long. As well as the text of the numeric selector on its left.
The overlapping issue on the price looks like a cache/fonts issue. I can't reproduce it.
Cookie-button witdh increased to 55px to avoid the weird display

The overlapping issue on the price looks like a cache/fonts issue. I can't reproduce it.
--> Correction: No cache issue. Typekit is not loaded (403 Forbidden)

403 Forbidden error when loading Typekit for eastern countries.

The file that contains the typekit definition is:

\hybris\bin\custom\distrelecB2Bstorefront\web\webroot\WEB-INF\config\spring-mvc-config.xml

We should add the values for the eastern countries:

<entry key="distrelec.cz" value="???????" />
<entry key="distrelec.hu" value="???????" />
<entry key="distrelec.ro" value="???????" />
<entry key="distrelec.sk" value="???????" />
@Ruben: With the next deployment the typekit configuration is fixed. But if all the frontend styling issue are fixed with that I can not say. So please check afterwards shortly if everything is fine.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5904] SEO - Migration HU, CZ, SK, RO, BG, HR, SI, SR Shop
item.description:
Observations :

  • These markets are going to be rolled out in a week:
    • HU, CZ, SK, RO (Distrelec webshop solution to Hybris)
    • BG, HR, SI, SR (Distrelec webshop solution to ELFA export shop)
  • Those website are not driving a lot of seo traffic.
  • Those website are not ranking on big position.
  • Those website can be migrated in a simple way. (oldwebsite/* =301> new website homepage)

Impacts :

  • In order to redirect User & Bot to the new plateform, simple redirection rules must be installed.

Demands :

  • Distrelec.com redirections : http://jira.distrelec.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5698
  • We can't spend time on manual redirections on distrelec.hu, .cz & .sk,
    we will only use "error fallback redirection" as the main redirection system, with this simple rule :
    • If a 404/500 is encountered by the webserver => 301 redirect to the homepage of the domain.

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - Migration HU, CZ, SK, RO, BG, HR, SI, SR Shop

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Redirection will take place on the application server.
On the site configuration there is a new attribute "redirect404" that allow to have a special redirect target in case of 404 error.
If this attribute is specified then the page is redirected 301 to the value specified.
If this attribute is not specified then the normal 404 page is displayed.

For websites CZ, SK, RO, HU this parameter has been set to: 

/home

The websites for BG, SI, SR are not yet in hyrbis
Great news !
can I test this functionnality somewhere ?
this will be testable on the next release v3.1.1 scheduled for this week.
Great news !

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5051] Hero Teaser // Brightcove player
item.description:
Importance
High

Ticket Creater
Kroeni, Jan

E-Mail Address
jan.kroeni@distrelec.com

Created
2014-09-15T14:35:09Z

Type of feedback
Change Request    

URL of the page where error / mistake was found

Description
Integration of the Brightcove Player is needed on the front page in the hero banner. We need to define a new Player id with the dimensions of the new hero banner. Options: The Timing is adjustable, so we can stay on a Video banner until it runs through to the end (approx. 10 seconds). Or, the Navigation overlay is shown and is not part of the clickable area.  The whole Video Needs to be clickable (like the Pictures).

Video area size: 740 x 300 px
Image area size: 220 x 300 px
Duration: Configurable
Player ID: Configurable
Video ID: Configurable

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Could you please already start to implement the player incl. the configurable duration.

The other point we'll check later.

Florian,
I looked at it with Jan briefly, and we have a few questions:

  • Basically he will analyze the capabilities of Brightcove regarding the requirements.
  • About the requirements:
    • Let's assume slides 1 and 2 of the hero teaser are images, slide 3 is a video
    • Should the video start playing as soon as slide 3 appears?
    • If yes:
      • does it play through every time the teaser is on slide 3?
      • Should any player controls be visible?
      • should the timing of the rotating teaser rotation be adjustable per slide? (e.g. 5s for slides 1 and 2, 10s for slide 3?)
    • If no:
      • does an adjustable timing really make sense, as the user will have to start the video manually?
      • would rather suggest that the slide does not rotate away after the user clicked on play.
  • Possible restrictions
    • it needs to be verified whether the video area can be linked
    • it needs to be verified whether we can get a "play" event from brightcove in order to stop hero teaser rotation (depending on requirements above)

General note:

  • BE work is needed:
  • New hero teaser type for video
  • where video ID, extra image, link are configurable

– yes:
— does it play through every time the teaser is on slide 3? --> yes
— Should any player controls be visible? --> no, as the slide stays as long as the video is playing plus a few seconds. The user still has the ability to skip the slide and move to the next one, this should somehow reset the video player for the next time around
— should the timing of the rotating teaser rotation be adjustable per slide? (e.g. 5s for slides 1 and 2, 10s for slide 3?) --> yes, otherwise the stills would stay on for let’s say 15 seconds, like the video

In Discussion with Florian, we decided the following logic:

  • Per Video Teaser, the setting, if the video should autoplay can be made in the CMS Cockpit
  • if the Autoplay of the Video is off, the video teaser is getting showed the same amount of time as the other teasers
  • If the user clicks on the play button for a NON Autoplay Video, the Teaser Autoplay is getting stopped and the video played
  • if the Autoplay of the Video is on, the Autoplay of the Hero Teaser is getting stopped, until the video is done with playing.
    if the video ended and the autoplay of the teaser was on, the autoplay of the teaser continues

Open Questions:

  • When the video Autoplay is off, we need to show the video controls, so that the user can start the video manually
  • Does the user with an Autoplay video need time after the video ended to click on the image teaser on the right side of the video
  • Should we display the controls always, also regarding fullscreen and sound option

New Logic:

  • controls are always visible on hover over the video
  • Per Video Teaser, the setting, if the video should autoplay can be made in the CMS Cockpit

Video WITH Autoplay:

  • The hero teaser switches to a video slide
  • The hero teaser autoplay stoppes
  • The video plays
  • The hero teaser continues with its autoplay standard time

Video WITHOUT Autoplay

  • The hero teaser switches to a video slide
  • The user clicks play on the video
  • The hero teaser autoplay stops
  • The video plays
  • The hero Teaser autoplay stays off since it was a user interaction to start the video
I agree

It looks you are using the player key that matches a different player without the blue coloring, which overrides the playerID. You will see your colored player at the corrected link below:

http://admin.brightcove.com/viewer/us20141117.1347/BrightcoveBootloader.swf?playerID=http://admin.brightcove.com/viewer/us20141117.1347/BrightcoveBootloader.swf?playerID=3101360480001&playerKey=AQ~~,AAACUpF3y2k~,IByipOot93wRxDqAe_Mn3LZ9uuoBWhKZ&%40videoPlayer=3876052536001&autoStart=&bgcolor=%23FFFFFF&debuggerID=&dynamicStreaming=true&flashID=video-3876052536001&height=312&isUI=true&isVid=true&startTime=1417422945294&width=480&wmode=transparent

Changes made to the link above include setting the playerID parameter equal to 3101360480001, setting the playerKey to AQ~,AAACUpF3y2k,IByipOot93wRxDqAe_Mn3LZ9uuoBWhKZ, and the videoPlayer parameter equal to 3101360480001.

For the new possibility to add a Video as a Hero Teaser Item, I need the following Data on the Hero Teaser Extended Item Data:

  • $ {itemData.isVideo}

    => Boolean, if the item is a boolean

  • $ {itemData.videoId}

    => Brightcove Video Id

  • $ {itemData.videoAutoplay}

    => Boolean if the video should autoplay

  • $ {itemData.picture}

    => ImageData Object of the Side Picture with altText and Url

  • $ {itemData.url}

    => Author can add a Link which will be around the side picture

  • $ {itemData.linkTarget}

    => How the link around the side picture should open

If you have any question regarding the implementation, please ask me!

Thanks, BR Jan

Hi,

in the current implementation we have the following:

    private ImageData picture;
    private String title;
    private String name;
    private String url;
    private LinkTargets linkTarget;
    private boolean fullsize;

In this case, you need only 3 additional attributes:

 ${itemData.isVideo},  ${itemData.videoId} and ${itemData.videoAutoplay}

Am I right?

Hi Nabil,

If there is currently no validation about the image size yes. because the side images has smaller dimensions..

BR Jan

Hi Jan,

now you have the following:

${itemData.video} : boolean value to tell whether the item is a video
${itemData.videoData} : an object of type DistVideoData containing all informations about the video
${itemData.videoAutoplay}: boolean value to tell whether the video should be auto played
Basic Frontend is done. Ticket is on hold since OCI Problems have more Priority
Integration Done. Can be tested after next deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4723] Multiple prices valid at the same time
item.description:
There are again problem with with the pice import IF-02. A similar or same problem has already been reported (see linked tickets).

E.g. article 13759735 has THREE different prices. They have been received via SAP price conditions 0076371250, 0080595838 and 0081991886.

Unfortunately, I cannot check the files that have been sent (too long ago). Most probably a new condition has been created without telling us that the old condition terminated (end date).
item.summary: Multiple prices valid at the same time

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
There are products having up to 6 prices: e.g. 11060024
It looks like we have 1'647'831 prices that are NON-unique.

SELECT
  count(*),
  {upg.code},
  {p.code},
  {c.isocode},
  {dpr.minqtd},
  {dpr.specialPrice}
FROM
  {DistPriceRow AS dpr
  JOIN UserPriceGroup AS upg ON {upg.pk}={dpr.ug}
  JOIN Product AS p ON {p.pk}={dpr.product}
  JOIN Currency AS c ON {c.pk}={dpr.currency}}
WHERE
  sysdate BETWEEN {dpr.startTime} AND {dpr.endTime}
GROUP BY
  {upg.code},
  {p.code},
  {c.isocode},
  {dpr.minqtd},
  {dpr.specialPrice}
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
ORDER BY {p.code}

These are the first 10 entries:

count   PriceList               ProductCode     Scale   SpecialPrice
--------------------------------------------------------------------
2	SalesOrg_UPG_7640_01	11015087	SEK	1	0
2	SalesOrg_UPG_7640_01	11015087	SEK	5	0
2	SalesOrg_UPG_7641_01	11015087	EUR	1	0
2	SalesOrg_UPG_7641_01	11015087	EUR	5	0
2	SalesOrg_UPG_7650_01	11015087	NOK	1	0
2	SalesOrg_UPG_7650_01	11015087	NOK	5	0
2	SalesOrg_UPG_7660_01	11015087	PLN	1	0
2	SalesOrg_UPG_7660_01	11015087	PLN	5	0
2	SalesOrg_UPG_7670_01	11015087	EUR	1	0
2	SalesOrg_UPG_7670_01	11015087	EUR	5	0

Is not only related to LT. All the following price lists are involved:

SalesOrg_UPG_7310_M01  => 141 duplicates. All related to Cat+ articles.
SalesOrg_UPG_7320_M01  => 141 duplicates. All related to Cat+ articles.
SalesOrg_UPG_7330_M01  => 64 duplicates. All related to Cat+ articles.
SalesOrg_UPG_7640_01
SalesOrg_UPG_7641_01
SalesOrg_UPG_7650_01
SalesOrg_UPG_7660_01
SalesOrg_UPG_7670_01
SalesOrg_UPG_7680_01
SalesOrg_UPG_7700_01
SalesOrg_UPG_7710_01  => 139464 duplicates
SalesOrg_UPG_7790_01
SalesOrg_UPG_7800_01

Can you give an estimation how long it will take to solve this?
Thx

@Florian: In case the above question is directed to me...
There are 3 open sub-tickets. I added an estimation for my ticket. The other tickets are assigned to Francesco and Evangelos and they have to provide an estimation.
This issue has been solved with ticket: DISTRELEC-5822

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5921] Roche OCI: lasting layout problems
item.description:
After several fixes, Roche ist still not able to order over OCI.

See: DISTRELEC-5713 (OCI Documentmode IE5 Quirks Problem)

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment:
A solution could be to break out of the iFrame and avoid to be rendered in IE5 Quirks-Mode.

Approach:

  • Make tis feature configurable via OCI-customer configuration
  • After successful login, first render a JavaScript to open an new Window/Tab or to replace the top-location with the success-page

The process with a new window/tab works for the customer.
Please implement this asap.

Hi,

I added two attributes to the OCI customer config:

 openInNewWindow and defaultRedirectURL

.

During the login phase, the redirect URL will get a parameter of type boolean called 

newWindow

.
According to its value, the frame should be open in a new window or in the same window.
BE task done.

Please test after the next deployment
Thanks

Hi
The first window/tab should be opened directly in the cart.
This is not the case at the moment.

You can try it with: https://test.distrelec.ch/ociEntry?username=webmaster@distrelec.com&password=123456&hook_url=http://q08.elfa.se:50000/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet&oci_version=4.0

• Current tab will be refreshed and redirected to: "home/cart"
  • New tab will be opened in "home"

Please retest
Will be tested by Roche on Firday December 11th.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5879] Brightcove // Video is not working
item.description:
All videos are not working at the moment.
It's not possible to play.

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment:
Hello,
there is a problem with the video content provider (Brightcove).

The video itself is not available. Try this URL:

http://admin.brightcove.com/viewer/us20141117.1347/BrightcoveBootloader.swf?amp%3B%40videoPlayer=3101360480001&amp%3BautoStart=&amp%3Bbgcolor=%23FFFFFF&amp%3BdebuggerID=&amp%3BdynamicStreaming=true&amp%3BflashID=video-3101360480001&amp%3Bheight=312&amp%3BisUI=true&amp%3BisVid=true&amp%3BplayerID=3101360480001&amp%3BplayerKey=AQ~~%2CAAACUpF3y2k~%2CIByipOot93xrfhhddiTQy3pGfCyK2c2_&amp%3BstartTime=1417166029484%22&amp%3Bwidth=480&amp%3Bwmode=transparent

Please reassign accordingly
Thanks!
Ruben

Adding parameter showNoContentMessage=true to the url confirms that the video is actually missing and not just network problem or something similar:

http://admin.brightcove.com/viewer/us20141117.1347/BrightcoveBootloader.swf?playerID=3101360480001&playerKey=AQ~~%2CAAACUpF3y2k~%2CIByipOot93xrfhhddiTQy3pGfCyK2c2_&@videoPlayer=3101360480001&autoStart=&bgcolor=%23FFFFFF&debuggerID=&dynamicStreaming=true&flashID=video-3101360480001&height=312&isUI=true&isVid=true&startTime=0&width=480&wmode=transparent&showNoContentMessage=true
Could this be (part of) the problem? When requesting the plugin you get a http 302 redirect to www.distrelec.ch.
OK, got it now: Any request to distrelec.ch/something is re-routed to www.distrelec.ch. Solution: make sure the url to the plugin starts with www.
Hi Rafi could you please check with Brighcove?

The video ID and the Player ID are the same.
http://admin.brightcove.com/viewer/us20141117.1347/BrightcoveBootloader.swf?playerID=3101360480001&playerKey=AQ~~%2CAAACUpF3y2k~%2CIByipOot93xrfhhddiTQy3pGfCyK2c2_&%40videoPlayer=3101360480001&autoStart=&bgcolor=%23FFFFFF&debuggerID=&dynamicStreaming=true&flashID=video-3101360480001&height=312&isUI=true&isVid=true&startTime=1417422945294&width=480&wmode=transparent

http://link.brightcove.com/services/player/bcpid3101360480001?bckey=AQ~~,AAACUpF3y2k~,IByipOot93wRxDqAe_Mn3LZ9uuoBWhKZ&bctid=3876052536001

Assumption: Until now only the video-id has been transmitted and there was always a fallback issued to the standard-player. Now we're transmitting as well the specific Player-id. Actual situation is that the player-id is taken as well for the video-id by the player. The values need to be transmitted/read correctly. Please let me know if this is the case, thanks.

http://admin.brightcove.com/viewer/us20141117.1347/BrightcoveBootloader.swf?playerID=3101360480001&playerKey=AQ~~%2CAAACUpF3y2k~%2CIByipOot93xrfhhddiTQy3pGfCyK2c2_&%40videoPlayer=3101360480001&autoStart=&bgcolor=%23FFFFFF&debuggerID=&dynamicStreaming=true&flashID=video-3876052536001&height=312&isUI=true&isVid=true&startTime=1417422945294&width=480&wmode=transparent

http://admin.brightcove.com/viewer/us20141117.1347/BrightcoveBootloader.swf?playerID=http://admin.brightcove.com/viewer/us20141117.1347/BrightcoveBootloader.swf?playerID=3876052536001&playerKey=AQ~~%2CAAACUpF3y2k~%2CIByipOot93xrfhhddiTQy3pGfCyK2c2_&%40videoPlayer=3876052536001&autoStart=&bgcolor=%23FFFFFF&debuggerID=&dynamicStreaming=true&flashID=video-3101360480001&height=312&isUI=true&isVid=true&startTime=1417422945294&width=480&wmode=transparent

Hi Florian,

There is another problem with the brightcove player:

If the user is on a https connection, the call which loads the brightcove javascript gets aborted from brightcove. Can you please contact brightcove and ask them, if and what the url in that case would be?

Thanks br jan
Rafael Burlet is in contact with the Brightcove support.

In order to serve the videos through secure HTTPS please add these parameters to your player code:

<param name="secureConnections" value="true" /> <param name="secureHTMLConnections" value="true" />

<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript"
        src="https://sadmin.brightcove.com/js/BrightcoveExperiences.js">
</script>

More info on how to implement a secure player in your webpages:
http://support.brightcove.com/en/video-cloud/docs/publishing-video-cloud-player-https-page
Added logic to use different urls depending on the protocol. Can be tested after next deployment.
Play-button is still not working, contacted brightcove support.

The problem is still that the player-ID is transmitted as well as Video-ID. This can be a bit confusing because, (@videoPlayer) parameter should use the video ID.

You can find more information about it here:
http://support.brightcove.com/en/video-cloud/docs/player-configuration-parameters

Incorrect Link: (Player-ID: 3101360480001 | Video-ID: 3101360480001 )

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4684] SEO - "Service Plus" products crawlable by Googlebot - robots.txt to edit & metatag to add
item.description:
Observations :

  • Service plus product are crawlable by google.
    exemple : http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Kennzeichnungsclip-mit-Bezeichnung-gelb%2C-WIC3-0-9-HellermannTyton---561-03101/p/serviceplus/90038672
  • This represent 50% of the url proposed inside sitemaps.
  • This represent (all language included) 600k pages.

Impacts :

  • In SEO, we only provide to the crawler landing page that have ranking strategy and and keywords objectives.
    Google is loosing his time and pollute his index with this pattern of pages.
  • That lead into not crawling the important and relevant pages and finally not be ranked properly inside the search engine result pages.

Demands :

  • Hide this pattern of url from google sight :
    • Replace the entire content of http://www.distrelec.ch/robots.txt by this content : 
      # Allow access to AdsBot
User-agent: AdsBot-Google
User-agent: Mediapartners-Google
User-agent: Googlebot-Image
Disallow:

# Block access & indexation to specific groups of pages
User-agent: *
Allow : */p/*?*page=1*
Disallow: *&filterURL=*
Disallow: */p/*?*page=*

Disallow: /search
Disallow: /checkToggles
Disallow: /cart
Disallow: /checkout
Disallow: /my-account
Disallow: /login
Disallow: /import-tool
Disallow: /support
Disallow: /feedback
Disallow: //app/etc/local.xml
Disallow: /medias/sys_master/*.gz
Disallow: /gsitemap*.xml.gz
Disallow: */p/serviceplus/*
Disallow: */ServicePlusShop/*
Disallow: /*/p/*/alsoBought*
Disallow: /*/p/*/recommendation*
Disallow: */MobileStore/cms/MobileStore*

Noindex: *&filterURL=*
Noindex: */p/*?*page=*
Noindex: /search
Noindex: /checkToggles
Noindex: /cart
Noindex: /checkout
Noindex: /my-account
Noindex: /login
Noindex: /import-tool
Noindex: /support
Noindex: /feedback
Noindex: //app/etc/local.xml
Noindex: /medias/sys_master/*.gz
Noindex: /gsitemap*.xml.gz
Noindex: */p/serviceplus/*
Noindex: */ServicePlusShop/*
Noindex: /*/p/*/alsoBought*
Noindex: /*/p/*/recommendation*
Noindex: */MobileStore/cms/MobileStore*


# Allow search crawlers to discover the sitemaps
Sitemap: /sitemap_index.xml

# Block BadBot
User-agent: CazoodleBot
User-agent: MJ12bot
User-agent: dotbot/1.0
User-agent: Gigabot
User-agent: admantx
User-agent: Wget
User-agent: semvisuBot
User-agent: Baiduspider
User-agent: SITRIX Crawler
User-agent: BLEXBot
User-agent: YandexBot
Disallow: /
    • Add inside the html head of every pages of this pattern http://www.distrelec.ch/*/p/serviceplus/* & http://www.distrelec.ch/*/ServicePlusShop/* this meta tag : 
      <meta name="robots" content="noindex,follow,noodp,noydir" />

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - "Service Plus" products crawlable by Googlebot - robots.txt to edit & metatag to add

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

comments.comment:
Hallo Pierre

Could I know why did you blocked this task?. It is assigned to me and just started the work on it.
I did it on Florian and Daniel request.
Thanks. I will ask them then.
Just to be sure, you are speaking about the fact that I modified the priority to "Blocker" or something else ?
Yes. about the blocker priority.

Ok, we are speaking about the same thing
It's part of a bundle of tiquet which need to be fixed before the distrelec.de rollout.
That's why it's been escalated in "blocker" to have it fixied ASAP in agrement with Daniel and Florian.

When will it be deployed ?
(to check if it worked)
By next deployment (v3.0.m19.)
ok, thx.
Can we close this?
No, it's not live and I could not test it.
That means you will be able to test after the go live?

Not on test : http://test.distrelec.ch/robots.txt
Or on www : http://www.distrelec.ch/robots.txt

The update haven't been deployed for http://www.distrelec.ch/robots.txt.

What is the status on this deployement ?
@Francesco, is it possible include it in today deployment ?

@Francesco :
What is the status of the deployment

  • of the update of the robots.txt ?
  • of the meta robots ?
    (they can be independently deployed)

Hi Pierre,
the robot.txt has been updated with the content you suggested.

About the serviceplus products, i think the meta information are already correct.

Ok, thx !

(I don't see it on test or www, I need to test on Q before deployment on www)

• Robots.txt : Not on production environment
  • noindex on service+ products : On production environment

Hi Pierre
this ticket is not in production yet.
Please test on Q system: test.distrelec.ch

Hi Francesco,
the robots.txt is not ready for production : http://www.diffnow.com/?report=yu0pi
Please replace the full content inside the robots.txt by the one inside jira.
